message.body: Beth! Thank you so much for visiting me. It was really nice seeing you and I hope you made it back safely and I'm sorry I didn't text yesterday to check up. Pls come down Any time you want. Also, I met w the landlord today about the gallery space- sounds reeeeally promising. I'd obv want to show your work so lets keep in touch ASAP
Yea!!!!! It was great to see you. I keep thinking about you. We are getting there!
Thanks again for the sandwich too. When is a good time to talk? Also, Did you read this article by Mark Godfrey on the mysterious faux nihilistic female painters of the 80s?
What?! No! That sounds amazing. I will check it out tonight. Let's talk as soon as I have a confirmed space. I'll call.
